page.title: 17CHILDREN'S PASTIMES
page.content: We asked 64 children aged 7-11 what their{favourite}pastime was.Results: {Spring/Summer-Indoors: }Winners were board games. Computer games and watching television were next.Only 2 people preferred reading.Others liked hide and seek, playing schools,marbles and video games.{Outdoors:}Winners were football and tennis followed by skipping,riding a bike,rounders and chasey.Other activites named were swimming,horse riding,and badminton. {Autumn/Winter-Indoors:} Over half the children chose board games.Eleven preferred computer games.Snooker, watching television, playing darts were also chosen.{Outdoors:}56 children chose sledging snowballing or building a snowman.Some chose chasey, football, horseriding,hide and seek and conkers. 35 children play{computer {games}and 25 play {video games}at home
